resources.string: Battery protection
Be careful of high temperature
Cooling
Temperature is normal
Please turn off the call or application to facilitate phone cooling.
At present, the phone is in heat-dissipating mode and you can only make emergency calls.
The phone has resumed normal operation.
Emergency call
The maximum warning temperature has been reached
The phone is at a high temperature and shutdown will be performed
Stop charging!
Stop charging!
Alarm
The phone is at a low temperature, so it will not be charged.
Battery temperature has exceeded the specified range
The battery temperature cannot be detected. Please make sure that the battery is properly installed, otherwise it will not be charged.
The battery temperature cannot be detected.
Please make sure that the battery is properly installed, otherwise it will not be charged
Currently, the battery temperature cannot be detected, and the phone is in heat-dissipating mode. Only make emergency calls. Make sure the battery is properly installed.
Battery elf

Dear InFocus users, because the battery inside the mobile phone is consumable, if you find the battery life has decreased significantly when using your phone, please send the phone to a retail agent for testing and maintenance to ensure that your mobile phone continues to operate in the best condition if you find battery life has decreased significantly in the use of the mobile phone. If there is any problem, you are welcome to call our customer service center, and the phone number is %1$s. Thank you.
Welcome to call customer service center, phone number %1$s, thank you.

Dear InFocus users, because the battery inside the mobile phone is a consumable, please send the mobile phone to the agent for testing and maintenance to ensure that the operating performance of your mobile phone can be maintained in the best condition if you find battery life has decreased significantly in the use of the mobile phone. If there is any problem, you are welcome to call customer service center. Thank you.
Welcome to call customer service center, thank you.
Reminder for decreasing the brightness
Because phone temperature is relatively high, turn down the brightness to protect the battery?
The battery is charged completely
Cancel
Shutdown
High temperature
Cooling
Temperature is normal
We offer to lower the screen brightness and turn off the application to cool the device.
At present, the device is in heat-dissipating mode and you can only make emergency calls.
The phone has resumed normal operation.
The maximum warning temperature has been reached
The device is at a high temperature and shutdown will be performed
Low temperature
The device is at a low temperature, so it will not be charged.
Currently, the battery temperature cannot be detected, and the device is in heat-dissipating mode. Only make emergency calls. Make sure the battery is properly installed.
Battery elf
Battery elf

Dear InFocus users, because the battery inside the device is a consumable, please send the device to the agent for testing and maintenance to ensure that the operating performance of your device can be maintained in the best condition if you find its battery life has decreased significantly in the use of the device. If there is any problem, welcome to call customer service center, phone number %1$s, thank you.

Dear InFocus users, because the battery inside the device is a consumable, please send the device to the agent for testing and maintenance to ensure that the operating performance of your device can be maintained in the best condition if you find its battery life has decreased significantly in the use of the device. If there is any problem, welcome to call customer service center. Thank you.
High temperature
Stop charging!
Poor battery contact
Battery temperature has exceeded the specified range
Make sure that the battery is properly installed
The device is at a high temperature, so it will not be charged.
The battery is charged completely
Cancel
At present, the device is in heat-dissipating mode, and please use later
Watch temperature is too high! We recommend dimming the screen and turning off the application. Are you sure you want to perform it?
The watch resumes normal operation.
The watch has reached the high temperature limit, about to shut down!
The watch is at a low temperature and charging will be stopped.
